original: Lindälv, Elof Alexius, överlärare, Göteborg, f. 3/9/87 i Älvsåker, Hall. 1. G. 35 m. Olga Wattsgård. — Fodk-sk :lär :ex. i Gbg 15. Lär. v. Gbgs små’sk:sem. 21-32, tillsyn :lär. 25-32, Överlar. f. Karl Joliansdistr. sed. 32. Stud:res. t. Norge, Danm., Finl., Grekl., USA. Led. av fortbildn :kurser f. lär. i Sv:e, Norge o. Finl., fornmin-nesinvent., särsk. i Hall. Led. av Väst-sv. hembygdsndn sed. 23, ordf. i Gbgs skolfören. 29-32, sekr. i Kulturminnes-fören. Gathenhielm ’sed. 37, utställn:-komm. f. folksk. jub :utställn. i Gbg 23 o. 42. Skr.: ped., arkeol. o. hem-bygdsv:skr., bl. a. Fjärås Bräcka (21), Halland (tills. m. G. Ahlberg 25), Bergvalls arb :kartor (27, även dansk, norsk o. finsk uppl.), Sv:es hist. i bilder (27), Skolornas uppsl:bok (tills, m. Ahlberg o. N. Olsson 30, 8. uppl. 43), Bergvalls arb :blad (tills. m. fö-reg. 33), Studieutflykter i Gbg o. dess omgivn. (tills. m. J. Aliri 43), medl. av redakt, f. Vår bygd 16-30, av Skola o. samhälle sed. 30. RNS :tOO.
translated: Lindälv, Elof Alexius, senior teacher, Gothenburg, b. 3/9/87 in Älvsåker, Halland. 1. M. Olga Wattsgård in 1935. - Elementary school teacher's exam in Gothenburg in 1915. Teacher at Gothenburg's primary school seminary from 1921-1932, supervising teacher from 1925-1932. Senior teacher for the Karl Jolian district since 1932. Study trips to Norway, Denmark, Finland, Greece, and the USA. Member of further education courses for teachers in Sweden, Norway, and Finland, cultural heritage inventory, especially in Halland. Member of the Western Swedish Heritage Council since 1923, chairman of Gothenburg's School Association from 1929-1932, secretary of the Cultural Heritage Association Gathenhielm since 1937, exhibition committee for the primary school jubilee exhibition in Gothenburg in 1923 and 1942. Written works: pedagogical, archaeological, and local history works, including Fjärås Bräcka (21), Halland (co-authored with G. Ahlberg in 1925), Bergvall's atlas (27, also Danish, Norwegian, and Finnish editions), Sweden's history in pictures (27), School's reference book (co-authored with Ahlberg and N. Olsson in 1930, 8th edition in 1943), Bergvall's leaflets (co-authored with the editorial team in 1933), Study excursions in Gothenburg and its surroundings (co-authored with J. Aliri in 1943), member of the editorial team for Vår Bygd from 1916-1930, member of School and Society since 1930. RNS: tOO.

publication.name: Study Excursions in Gothenburg and its Surroundings
